original_text: Whether it is the bed or anything she was sitting on, when anyone touches it, they will be unclean till evening.
korean_text: 그의 침상 위에나 그가 앉은 자리 위에 있는 것을 만지는 모든 자도 저녁까지 부정할 것이며

sentences.original_text: Whether it is the bed or anything she was sitting on
sentences.korean_translation: 그것이 침대이든지 그녀가 앉았던 어떤 것이든지

sentences.original_text: they will be unclean till evening
